problem.markdown:
SPELL CHECK - comparative adjectives
  • Add -er to short adjectives to form the comparative: old -> older.
  • Add -r to adjectives ending in -e: large -> larger.
  • Change adjectives ending in -y (after a consonant) to -i, and add -er: happy -> happier.
  • Double the final consonant on some adjectives ending with a vowel and a consonant: hot -> hotter.
Look at the spell check box. Write the comparative form of these adjectives. 1- short = shorter 2- easy = easier 3- big = bigger 4- busy = busier
